name: The Dark Maze (itch) (Desentcare)
description:
Morning is coming. Can you fight your nightmares to the end? Or mine? Or his?... Who's that he...

Make your way through a maze made by random. Fight some enemies... placed by random. Be a player chosen by random. With a weapon... chosen by random! Yey

WASD - Move

Click and hold - attack

R - restart level or game(in the end)

E - next level (you'll see where it works)

Reload the page for a new character and weapon! Also reload the level or page if you are stuck.

Credit to 0x72 for pixelart, you can check it out here: https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

Made for mini-jam 105 https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-105-dreamy
Limitation: Every playthrough is unique
Theme: Dreamy
